sentences.en: Let's begin today's meeting. (variant 1)
The first item on the agenda is budget review. (variant 1)
We'll discuss this quarter's performance. (variant 1)
Welcome everyone to the meeting. (variant 1)
The main purpose today is strategy revision. (variant 1)
We have limited time, so let's be efficient. (variant 1)
First, let's review the results from our last meeting. (variant 1)
Please feel free to ask questions at any time. (variant 1)
We'll address the high-priority issues first. (variant 1)
Has everyone received the meeting materials? (variant 1)
